mapper.select: SELECT BOARD.BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , CONTENT , BOARD_DATE , BOARD.USER_CODE , USERS.USER_NAME , BOARD_CNT FROM BOARD INNER JOIN USERS ON BOARD.USER_CODE = USERS.USER_CODE WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 31 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD.BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_DATE , BOARD_CNT , CONTENT , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM BOARD INNER JOIN ATTACHED_FILE ON BOARD.BOARD_NO = ATTACHED_FILE.BOARD_NO WHERE BOARD.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into ASK_AND_ANSWER_BOARD ( ASK_AND_ANSWER_BOARD_PASSWORD , ASK_AND_ANSWER_BOARD_PUBLIC_OR_PRIVATE , BOARD_NUM) VALUES( #{askAndAnswerBoardVO.askAndAnswerBoardPassword} , #{askAndAnswerBoardVO.askAndAnswerBoardPublicOrPrivate}, #{boardNum} )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT (BOARD_NUM) FROM BOARD WHERE board_type = 30
AND ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue} , '%')

SELECT board.BOARD_NUM , board.BOARD_TITLE , CONTENT , board.BOARD_DATE , board.USER_CODE , board.BOARD_CNT , attached_file.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , attached_file.ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , ASK_AND_ANSWER_BOARD.ASK_AND_ANSWER_BOARD_PASSWORD , ASK_AND_ANSWER_BOARD.ASK_AND_ANSWER_BOARD_PUBLIC_OR_PRIVATE , ASK_AND_ANSWER_BOARD.IS_ANSWER_BOARD , ASK_AND_ANSWER_BOARD.IF_ANSWER_BOARD_NUM FROM BOARD INNER JOIN attached_file ON BOARD.BOARD_NUM = attached_file.BOARD_NUM INNER JOIN ASK_AND_ANSWER_BOARD ON BOARD.BOARD_NUM = ASK_AND_ANSWER_BOARD.BOARD_NUM WHERE BOARD.BOARD_NUM = ${boardNum}
